boardgame.name: Gildie Londynu
Guilds of London
Die Zünfte von London
倫敦公會
boardgame.description: London: The biggest, most important and richest city in England in the late medieval and early modern periods._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Guilds played a major role in the lives of London's citizens, controlling the way in which trade, manufacturing and business was conducted in the city. The members of the guilds were rich men, who were appointed to the most influential positions in the community and wielded immense civic power. The chief representative of the Guilds became the Lord Mayor of London, and the leading delegates of the Guilds became his Aldermen. Other members of the Guilds were the burghers of London. The Guilds ran the city and controlled its commerce; each had its own Hall and its own Coat of Arms. Representatives of the Guilds met at the Guildhall to discuss the great issues of the day._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Guilds of London, you place your liverymen in strategic Guilds, building your power base, so that you can achieve the status of Master in many of them. You also have the opportunity to spread your power into the commercially valuable Ulster or Virginia plantations. Control of each Guild provides victory points and additional actions that you can exploit, so that you can control the future development of the city._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Brand new copy of Tony Boydell_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Gulids of London still in the shrink. Bought at UK Games Expo for same price I am selling here so not looking to make profit - Surprised Stare Games had sold out by the time I arrived on the Saturday but found a copy on another stall (clearly bought from SSG and marked up). After watching playthrough video have decided its not for me. Postage to UK address: £5.99 using My Hermes. Please contact me for postage cost to other European destinations
